mapper.sql: `id`, `connection_id` as connectionId, `user_id` as userId, `last_access_time` as lastAccessTime
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(a.`id`) as id, c.`id` as connectionId, c.`creator_id` as userId, COALESCE(MAX(a.`last_access_time`), c.`update_time`)as lastAccessTime FROM connect_connection c LEFT JOIN connect_connection_access a ON c.id=a.connection_id GROUP BY c.`id` HAVING lastAccessTime < TIMESTAMPADD(SECOND, -#{intervalSeconds}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);

SELECT MAX(a.`id`) as id, c.`id` as connectionId, c.`organization_id` as organizationId, c.`creator_id` as userId, COALESCE(MAX(a.`last_access_time`), c.`update_time`)as lastAccessTime FROM connect_connection c LEFT JOIN connect_connection_access a ON c.id=a.connection_id WHERE c.is_temp=1 GROUP BY c.`id` HAVING lastAccessTime < TIMESTAMPADD(SECOND, -#{intervalSeconds}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
